workflows.name: Basic Processing
steps: Run the tool: test-tool run --input data.txt

workflows.name: Batch Processing
steps: Navigate to directory with input files
Run batch command: for file in *.txt; do test-tool run --input "$file" --output "${file%.txt}.json" --format json; done

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.context: Quick start example showing basic command usage

examples.title: JSON Output Format
examples.context: Example of processing with JSON output format

examples.title: Batch Processing Loop
examples.code:
for file in *.txt; do
  test-tool run --input "$file" --output "${file%.txt}.json" --format json
done
examples.context: Process multiple files in a loop

examples.title: Python API Usage
examples.code:
from test_tool import TestTool

tool = TestTool()
result = tool.run(input_file="data.txt", format="json")
print(result)
